headline: Apollo’s Atlas SP Gets Blue Chip Ratings For New Unit
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Atlas SP Partners, the structured credit business of Apollo Global Management Inc., has set up a subsidiary that will borrow money, and three major bond graders have given blue-chip credit ratings to the unit.
